subject: Interview Invitation for Marketing Specialist Role at NovaTech Corporation
body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Specialist position at NovaTech Corporation. We were impressed with your creative background and would like to invite you to participate in an interview.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 20 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Maya Jensen, Director of Marketing, who will walk you through the role and answer any questions you may have about our brand and team.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Ava Morales
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Corporation
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
